sourcesContent:
Add New Patient
Patient Id is Required
Patient's Name is Required
It should not contain a digit and any special symbol
Gender is Required
Date of birth is required
Address is Required
Contact No is required
It should be a 10 digit number
Its not a valid number
Email Id is Required
Email Id is not in the correct format
Username is required
Username must not contain any whitespace
Password is required
Password is must be of atleast 8 characters long,must contain 1 uppercase,1 lowercase and a special symbol and a digit
Loading...
